title: Supply & Audit Services
description: Products are audited according to Karvise standards for labeling, packaging, lead times and quality control. In case of non-conformity, production is redone or packaging is corrected.
features: Pre-production, during production and post-production audits

title: International Trade Consulting
description: We provide not only product sourcing but also export consulting services to companies. This way, manufacturers improve their export quality, while importers access high-standard products.

title: Price Advantage
description: Thanks to our agreements, we offer importers supply opportunities below factory prices. We reduce costs by leveraging economies of scale.
features: Cost advantage through bulk purchasing power

title: Continuous Updates
description: We guarantee that our customers are informed at every stage by providing real-time information flow about production and shipping processes. Transparent communication with customized reporting.

title: Wide Industry Diversity
description: We have a portfolio of specialized manufacturers in many areas from playground equipment to industrial spare parts, from sports equipment to rubber floor coatings, urban furniture, modern sun loungers and decorative lighting, aluminum ladders, and pedestals for flooring.

title: Quality Guarantee
description: We ensure that quality standards are met throughout the entire supply process. Your products go through a comprehensive quality control process before shipment.
features: Free replacement in case of quality issues
